content: free version available as video tutorial on my blog https //www sweetsofties com/2023/05/mosaic-goldfish html free version shows 1 of the 4 fish scale designs for all 4 fish scale designs please download the written pdf pattern the mosaic goldfish is a fast and no-sew amigurumi project that includes 4 different scale designs allowing you to crochet a variety of fish more customizations can be done by using different yarn color combinations yarn weights and yarn fibers stitches featured in creating the fish scales include the use of drop stitches puff stitches and working in back loops only this underwater sea creature can be made into a keychain or as a realistic stuffed animal toy for children to play with it is great as a birthday gift christmas or holiday gift or as craft fair products girls and boys alike will love these unisex and gender neutral stuffies make it in your recipient s favorite colors or turn it into a colorful rainbow fish this 13-page pdf pattern includes detailed written instructions and 55+ step-by-step progress photos to guide you through the doll making process **size** length 3 5 9cm note size varies depending on yarn weight and hook size used this measurement is based on materials list **materials** fingering/sock weight #1 yarn in desired colors i used hobbii friends cotton 8/4 6mm plastic safety eyes x2 2 25mm crochet hook stuffing scissors note on materials this versatile pattern can be worked with different yarn weights remember to use a hook size appropriate to the yarn weight to crochet tight stitches without gaps **level** ★★★☆☆ intermediate requires familiarity with stitches used below changing colors and attaching yarn **stitches & techniques used us terminology ** fo = fasten_off yo = yarn over skip = skip magic_ring = magic_ring chain = chain st = stitch slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet blo = back loops only ds = drop stitch single_crochet into the round below puff *copyright notice this pattern is ©
